subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: At 6 feet 3 inches and 205 pounds, David Oliver has the body of an N.F.L. free safety and not a guy who slips lithely over 10 hurdles for a living.
snippet: At 6 feet 3 inches and 205 pounds, David Oliver has the body of an N.F.L. free safety and not a guy who slips lithely over 10 hurdles for a living.
